effect.black-white: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.black-2-white-2: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text.black-white: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
